title: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When using the package view selection and dialog to search for declarations, the search initializes with the fully qualified name. However, this search does not return any results.
EB: The search functionality in the package view selection and dialog should first attempt to retrieve the Java element based on the fully qualified name. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package view selection and dialog.
2. Enter a fully qualified name for a declaration in the search field.
3. Click on the search button.
4. Observe that no results are displayed.
